|lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=eCos; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=ZIO |default_ssid_regex=^ZIO$ |default_ip=192.168.10.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=08:10:75 |oui_eth=08:10:75 }} {{TagLine|Wireless G High Speed Broadband Router}} "PB-862-M04F-30-GP", "MAY 25 2005", and a date code of '''0728''' (July 2007) is silkscreened on the board. :The board is using mostly '''Fcon''' branded radial capacitors.. though there are two '''CA''' branded capacitors on the power side. ==Serial== ===Pinout===
